00001 package liquibase.dbdoc;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.change.Change;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.exception.DatabaseHistoryException;
00006 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00007 
00008 import java.io.File;
00009 import java.io.FileWriter;
00010 import java.io.IOException;
00011 import java.util.List;
00012 
00013 public class PendingChangesWriter extends HTMLWriter {
00014 
00015     public PendingChangesWriter(File rootOutputDir, Database database) {
00016         super(new File(rootOutputDir, "pending"), database);
00017     }
00018 
00019     protected String createTitle(Object object) {
00020         return "Pending Changes";
00021     }
00022 
00023     protected void writeBody(FileWriter fileWriter, Object object, List<Change> ranChanges, List<Change> changesToRun) throws IOException, DatabaseHistoryException, JDBCException {
00024         writeCustomHTML(fileWriter, object, ranChanges, database);
00025         writeChanges("Pending Changes", fileWriter, changesToRun);
00026     }
00027 
00028     protected void writeCustomHTML(FileWriter fileWriter, Object object, List<Change> changes, Database database) throws IOException {
00029     }
00030 }
